column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A young man traveling with a woman drove a Tacoma at speed along Street 217. Near Stung Meanchey pagoda
column4: he swerved to the left and crashed onto a grass road divider
column5: hitting a small tree and a light pole.Â This incident happened at 4:00 AM on Tuesday
column8: near Stung Meanchey Pagoda in Sangkat Stung Meanchey II
column10: Phnom Penh.------Luckily no one was injured in this incident.------After the incident
column11: the vehicle was lifted away to the Land Traffic Office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police
